hero.title: Build offensive security talent and deliver verified penetration testing.
hero.description: HSOCIETY is a cycle-based offensive security platform. We train beginners, integrate them into a professional community, deploy them into supervised real-world engagements, and convert them into trusted penetration testers.

cycle.title: The 6-Phase Security Cycle
cycle.subtitle: A structured loop that produces both skilled professionals and real security outcomes.

experience.title: Why Real Experience Matters
experience.subtitle: Professional penetration testing is learned by executing real work under supervision, not by theory alone.

cards.title: Operational exposure
cards.description: Students learn scoping, evidence collection, and reporting in real environments.

cards.title: Accountable delivery
cards.description: Every engagement is reviewed by senior operators before findings are delivered.

cards.title: Career credibility
cards.description: Graduates build professional portfolios tied to verified, supervised outcomes.

principle.title: Execution Over Marketing
principle.subtitle: We measure impact by outcomes: real skills built, real vulnerabilities found, real fixes delivered.
bullets: Every engagement is scoped, authorized, and documented with reproducible evidence.
Training is tied directly to live operational work, not abstract modules.
Companies receive clear reporting, remediation guidance, and optional retesting.
